--- product_code: pl06 description: 10mm Polish-Lithuanian Drabant (Musketeers) title: 10mm Polish-Lithuanian Drabant (Musketeers) breadcrumb: Drabant (Musketeers) name: Polish-Lithuanian Drabant (Musketeers) cost: $14.00 paypal_id: JE5TWXL9WKXDY ---

This is a Drabant (Musketeers) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one rotmistrz/standard bearer strip (pl06a), six column strips (a mix of pl06b–d) and eight line strips (a mix of pl06e–h).
